sentences.en: And a clear band with less interferer was seen at 58.6℃ as anneal temperature.
sentences.cn: 退火温度为58.6℃时,β-actin扩增产物 的条带最清晰.

sentences.en: Anneal means making harden steel soft and removing brittleness.
sentences.cn: 退火就是使淬火钢变软并消除其脆性.

sentences.en: Firstly, equiaxed microstructure could be produced by treatments including hot compression and duplex anneal.
sentences.cn: 本文首先通过变形及双重退火获得了很好的等轴组织.

sentences.en: General anneal cooling rate slowest, fire rate quicker, the quenching cooling rate is quicker.
sentences.cn: 一般地退火的冷却速度最慢, 正火的冷却速度快, 淬火的冷却速度更快.

sentences.en: In glass anneal furnace, SR 70 series programmable PID modulator is used as temperature controller.
sentences.cn: 在玻璃退火炉温控中, 选用SR70系列可编程PID调制器.

sentences.en: Reducing annealing furnace: The furnace is used to anneal and reduce cold rolled carbon steels.
sentences.cn: 还原退火炉: 炉子用于冷轧低碳钢的还原退火.

sentences.en: Results The 302 bp desired product was obtained at each anneal temperature.
sentences.cn: 结果各退火温度条件下,β-actin扩增产物 均形成长度为302bp片段,且未见非特异性扩增产物条带.

sentences.en: Temperatures of anneal: At 30℃, the stripes of amplification were most distinctive.
sentences.cn: 退火温度: 在30℃时扩增条带最清晰.

sentences.en: The puller also applied growing and vacuum anneal of laser crystal.
sentences.cn: 该设备也适用于多种激光晶体的生长和激光晶体的真空退火.

sentences.en: The resistivity and flexivity of the resistance thermostat metal change while the anneal process change.
sentences.cn: 当退火工艺变化时,电阻系列热双金属的电阻率和温曲率等主要性能将产生变化.

sentences.en: This paper direct independent reinforcement of column against, explore anneal reinforcing bar spiral hoops strengthen technology.
sentences.cn: 本文就是针对独立柱的加固, 探索用退火钢筋绕丝加固技术.

sentences.en: Three: they are hardening, temper and anneal.
sentences.cn: 三个过程: 它们是淬火 、 回火和退火.

sentences.en: We produce the annealed wire with high - quality low carbon raw materials through wire drawing, anneal process.

sentences.cn: 你说的退火是什么意思?

trans.tran_cn: 使退火； 使加强， 使变硬
trans.tran_en: to make metal or glass hard by heating it and then slowly letting it get cold
